params.text: Ono ye Abby ne dole ye.
Abby ayagala dole ye.
Abby ayagala nyo okuzanya ne dole ye.
Leero dole ye yabuze.
Abby atunudde mu nyumba.
Dole ye eri mufumbiro? Atunula wansi w’emmeeza.
Dole ye eri mudiiro? Atunula wansi w’entebbe.
Dole ye eri mukisenge? Anoonya eyo dole ye.
Dole ye eri mu lusuku? Anoonya eyo dole ye.
“ Dole yange eri ludda wa?  ” Abby nabuuza kkapa.
“  Myau ,  ” kappa bwegamba.
“  Dole yange eri ludda wa? ”  Abby abuuza enkoko.
“ Dole yange eri ludda wa?  ”  Abby abuuza embwa
“  wuf wuf wuf  ”  embwa bwegamba. Embwa yasanga dole.

"Dole eyabula" credits

This work, "Dole eyabula", is a derivative of "The Lost Doll" as translated by Alisha Berger and used under CC BY. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. "The Lost Doll" is based on the original story: 'Umdoli Lolahlekile', by Moleboge Shibboleth Poho. © Room to Read, 2015.

This work, "The Lost Doll" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
